channel.title: Whats new in RS hacking?
channel.description: Im pretty sure the last time I was around these froums Aryan was still up and working. So im just wondering whats new in the runescape hacking/botting world. Is SCAR just about the only way to go now? or are there any bots that dont need to control your mouse? Or whats the new thing going on? Im just trying to catch back up and get back into.

item.title: Whats new in RS hacking?
item.dc:creator: @Evan2 Evan_
item.description:
@Evan2 wrote:

[quote=“Silver Lining, post:8, topic:159926”]Nexus pro is alright by the accounts I’ve heard and not ignored. Nexus lite is a limited piece of shit to give you a taste and an aftertaste akin to a burning desire for more.[/quote]Don’t you mean mcdonalds for fatt people instead of nexus?

Read full topic

item.title: Whats new in RS hacking?
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

Nexus pro is alright by the accounts I’ve heard and not ignored. Nexus lite is a limited piece of shit to give you a taste and an aftertaste akin to a burning desire for more.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats new in RS hacking?
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

iirc with nexus lite you have to have the bot open above all other windows, while with pro you are able to run multiple instances of the bot.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats new in RS hacking?
item.dc:creator: @Blaqspade Blaqspade
item.description:
@Blaqspade wrote:

well I ment with client hacking, boting and such, so with this Nexus lite is there a greater chance of being banned or whats the difference between the two?

Read full topic

item.title: Whats new in RS hacking?
item.dc:creator: @_cake _cake
item.description:
@_cake wrote:

nothings new in rs hacking.
theres things new in rs client hacking, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats new in RS hacking?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Its not new, its been out for quite a long while you might already know it by the name ibot.
Its a pretty decent bot, you can try out neXus lite out for free or pay for the neXus pro, ruler gave some of us neXus pro on irc for a few months and i used it for a while - this was months ago and i’m still not banned on that account.

Read full topic

item.title: Whats new in RS hacking?
item.dc:creator: @Blaqspade Blaqspade
item.description:
@Blaqspade wrote:

I see so this NeXus is the new bot in town huh? Is it worth getting into, Is it easily bannable and such? or you just gotta create a bunch of drones and mine essence and transfer them to your main and sell them is about the only way to make money or what?

Read full topic

item.description:
@tL wrote:

Runescape cheating is pretty much dead.
